sentences.sContent: She bought an English dictionary for me.
sentences.sContent_eng: She bought an English dictionary for me.
sentences.sCn: 她给我买了一本英语词典。

sentences.sContent: I bought the car from the store for cash.
sentences.sContent_eng: I bought the car from the store for cash.
sentences.sCn: 我用现金从这家商店买下这辆汽车。

sentences.sContent: We stood in with him who bought us the meals.
sentences.sContent_eng: We stood in with him who bought us the meals.
sentences.sCn: 他为我们买回了吃的，大家分摊了那笔钱。

phrases.pCn: 产品返销；补偿交易；补进
价廉物美的东西；廉价品
买下…的全部产权；出钱使…放弃地位
